title: Interpretation of seeing a wristwatch in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a wristwatch by Ibn Sirin Most interpreters of visions and dreams believe that the watch may indicate the Day of Resurrection or indicate some important matters that may be sprinkled with goodness and blessings, but Ibn Sirin concluded that dreaming of a watch is not good to see. . It is not a good interpretation of seeing a wristwatch for individuals. If the vision is for an unmarried girl, her vision of a wristwatch indicates an upcoming marriage, and the color of the watch in this case indicates the status of the one who marries her. Or the marriage is delayed, and God knows best. If the fortune teller is a student, his vision indicates his success. If the fortune teller is a man and sees in his dream a gold watch, this is a sign of profit, earning money, or success in trade. Interpretation of seeing a wrist watch for a married womanIf the wife sees in her dream If she takes the watch from her hand, this means that there are problems between her and her husband, but if the watch that she took out was a wall clock, then this is a good sign, because it indicates her death due to worry and sadness. Interpretation of seeing a clock for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman can see a clock in her dream, and this is news. Sarah is happy news, or that she will give birth to a girl, and God knows best. In this case, this vision is far from bad. Interpretation of the vision of buying a watch: A person who sees in his dream that he is buying a wristwatch is a good omen and an indication of the satisfaction of his desires, especially if the watch is gold, as it is It indicates that the life of the person with the vision will change. But they are changes for the better, according to the will of God Almighty. But if the dreamer sees in a dream that he bought a silver watch, this indicates his piety and the soundness of his religion, and gives all the duties owed to God in the worship due to them. Interpretation of the gift of a wristwatch in a dream The interpreters of visions and dreams turned to the opinion It is said that this vision portends not only good, but also bad. As for what brings goodness, when a person sees in his dream that someone gives him a watch, this vision shows that he will overcome difficulties. In his life, but on the contrary, the evil he brings can indicate neglect and lack of interest in success or the goal to be achieved, but rather dealing with trivial matters, and God is Most High and He knows best. What was said about the evil of seeing a wristwatch in a dream? If the watch is broken This is a sign of losses, destruction, or that the time in which we waited for something has ended. If one loses it in a dream, this indicates exposure to bad things and harassment that bring unhappiness. Interpretation of a dream about a black wristwatch: If anyone sees a black watch, this indicates superiority and success in Study it. The wristwatch also indicates the return of an absent person, the return of a newcomer from travels, or the return of a lover to his beloved after a long separation. In general, a black wristwatch in a dream is considered a sign of kindness, especially if the watch is beautiful. This is evidence of happiness and stability in life, whether emotionally or Practically, familially, or socially. As for the situation where the wristwatch looks ugly and the time is not specified, this is an unpleasant vision that indicates illness or problems in life. If someone looks at the watch a lot in his dream, this is evidence that he will

If someone looks at the watch a lot in his dream, this is evidence that he will

title: Interpretation of a dream about praying for an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about praying for a single woman: Prayer is one of the pillars of Islam that God has imposed on every act of worship. Without it, life is not right. When a girl sees prayer in her dream, she will certainly be happy and rush to find out the interpretation of this vision. . So, in this article, we look together at the most important things that the scholars of interpretation said, so follow us. Interpretation of a dream about praying for a single woman. Interpretation scholars say that seeing an unmarried girl praying in a dream portends a lot of good and abundant livelihood that she will obtain soon. If the dreamer sees her performing the Istikhara prayer in a dream, then this It indicates the extent of her righteousness and closeness to God Almighty. As for seeing the dreamer praying among many people in a dream, this indicates that she is approaching her wedding date with the right person for her. Seeing the dreamer in a dream performing prayer while she is happy means that the time has come to achieve her goal and she will gain... Lots of good things. Watching the dreamer perform the prayer after washing with clean water indicates that he carries among the people good and good qualities and good behavior. Interpretation of a dream about praying for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing an unmarried girl praying in a dream leads to many good things. And that the time has come to achieve her goal. Also, seeing the girl in a dream praying facing the Qiblah symbolizes the great distraction that she feels at that time. As for seeing the dreamer in a dream performing prayer humbly, this indicates the near comfort and abundance that he will soon obtain. And in If the fortuneteller sees her in a dream performing prayer while she is sad, he will give her good news of something similar to joy, and God will fulfill her desire. Seeing the same girl praying with people in a dream means that she enjoys a high status among many and God will give her good news. What is the interpretation of seeing the noon prayer in a dream for a single woman? If an unmarried girl sees in a dream performing the noon prayer, this means that she will enjoy good health, prosperity, and long life. And if the dreamer sees in a dream that he performed the noon prayer humbly, this indicates that he will enjoy a close marriage with a good person characterized by generosity. And the dreamer’s dream that she Performing the noon prayer with humility indicates that it will achieve many goals and reach its goal. What is the interpretation of seeing prayer in the mosque in a dream for a single woman? Some people ask about the interpretation of mosque prayer for an unmarried woman, and many scholars confirm that it indicates the approaching achievement of goals and aspirations. Also, Seeing a girl praying inside the mosque in a dream indicates her good reputation and her walking on the straight path. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is entering the mosque and praying, this portends success and excellence that he will achieve soon. And if the dreamer sees in a dream that he is praying in the mosque, this indicates abundant sustenance, And he is close to achieving many things. As for the dreamer who sees himself entering the mosque and praying with the people, it symbolizes happiness and a good position that you will gain among them. What is the interpretation of the evening prayer in a dream for a single woman? If an unmarried girl sees the noon prayer in a dream and performs it humbly, then this Means

title: Ibn Sirin’s most important interpretations of seeing an ant in a dream

preview.html: Ant in a dreamA dream that needs interpretation. The dreamer is confused about what it symbolizes and what it refers to, and we will provide you with this by knowing all the interpretations of the dream, which of course differed according to the details and what the person saw in his dreams. The ant in a dream. What is the interpretation of the ant in a dream? Imam Nabulsi and other interpreters had a famous saying about seeing an ant in a person’s dream, Whether he is single or married, male or female, and from here we quote their sayings in several successive places: If the dreamer sees before his eyes a large ant emerging from somewhere in the house, then he is often uncomfortable or satisfied with what he is, and often complains of Bad condition, poverty, or illness while not being grateful for the other blessings he has. If the current period is full of problems and annoyances, the dreamer will not escape from them quickly due to his inability to solve or adapt. If a group of ants sees him emerging from their holes in the ground, then he should He expects conflicts in his field of work and a set of obstacles to achieving his ambitions and goals, if he is an ambitious person and ready for change. What is the interpretation of an ant in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin said that if the dreamer lacks strength and activity and relies on laziness and dependence on others, then this is an invitation for him to shake off Dust himself off and stand up to continue his path in life without laziness. He also said that it is a sign of a very weak opponent but who can influence the dreamer and shake his self-confidence and abilities. The ant that walks in the dreamer’s mouth is a sign that he takes people’s symptoms as chewing in his mouth, which calls for Repentance and return to God. As for his leaving his body, it indicates the need to take care of his health, as he will be exposed to a serious illness in the coming period. You still do not find what you are looking for? Introduction by Google to the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site and see everything that interests you. An ant in a dream for a single woman. The girl who follows her as she walks on the ground searching for food shows her lack of enthusiasm in her life and her desire to have a friend who is the same age as her so that she can gain some positive energy from her. If pregnancy An ant on her shoulders and leaving it far from the girl's house indicates a state of sadness in the coming days due to the loss of a loved one or her failure in an unequal emotional relationship. If she suffers from an ant bite and her skin turns red, then she will be injured at the hands of a friend who she thought was the same. Once upon a time, he is the closest and most honest to her. The white ant in her dream is evidence of her good reputation and praiseworthy life among men. An ant in a dream for a married woman. It was said in the interpretation of dreams for a married woman who is very concerned about her home and children, and her vision of the ant means that she is trying to organize the children’s lives and put their feet at the beginning of the right path. The dreamer's relationship with her husband may be marred by some problems that come to them from the outside due to others' dissatisfaction with the stability of their lives and family happiness. Seeing an ant in her husband's clothes shows an envious eye looking at her and wishing her to lose grace. If she is newly married and wants to have children, then seeing a white ant walking

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream by Ibn Shirin and Al-Nabulsi.

preview.html: Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi Find out more on Al-Mohazat website. You can also watch: Surat Al-Sajdah in a dream Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream Whoever reads Surat Al-Fatihah, may God Almighty bless him. Whoever dreams of reading the opening of the book, the doors of goodness and the doors of goodness will be opened for him Evil is closed before him. Interpretation of Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream by Ibn SirinoMuhammad bin Shirin explained in his book Interpretation of Great Dreams by Scholars, that reading Surat Al-Fatihah indicates a lot of sustenance and goodness that will come in the near and future stage of the life of the Messenger. Reading Surat Al-Fatihah in a man or young man’s dream Unmarried indicates that this man will marry 7 women at different stages of his life. Or it may be an indication that this person is one of those who memorize the Book of God, are sincere in it and follow its teachings. It can herald the healing of the sick, the removal of worries, the repayment of debt or the return of the absent. Or avoiding the evil of oneself and the evil of others, such as envy, hatred, or malice, and perhaps it is good news for the general public who is the closest pilgrim to the House of God Almighty, and God knows best.Reciting Surah Al-Fatihah over the dead. As for seeing Surah Fatihah read in relation to the dead person in a dream, it indicates his exaltation and the house of the dead person in the afterlife. It also indicates biography. The goodness and good reputation that the dead left behind among people, and God knows best. Interpretation of Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream for a single woman. And about the interpretation of seeing reading or hearing Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream for an unmarried woman or an unmarried girl. It is good news for her immediate well-being and the imminent fulfillment of a desire she has or the achievement of a goal she has long sought. Single and you wish for it. It could be a harbinger of success, obtaining a job, or improving the circumstances of an unmarried woman, especially if the unmarried girl sees it. She herself is reading Surat Al-Fatihah with reverence and in a beautiful voice, and God knows best. Interpretation of Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream for a married woman. As for the scholars’ interpretation of the vision Surah Al-Fatihah in a woman’s dream? Married / married. It is an indication of the collapse of problems and disputes between spouses. Or a door to the livelihood of a relative of hers or her husband, or news of an imminent pregnancy. If this one wishes, or that he will soon pay off his debt and reduce it, God willing, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Fatihah in A dream for a pregnant woman. A pregnant female vision. Reading Surah Al-Fatihah is a sign of her safety and health. And for her fetus, the removal of sorrows and problems, and a natural birth, God willing, and the abundance of food, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream for men. We will explain the vision of reading Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream for a man. It may foretell the nearness of sustenance or the imminent marriage of an unmarried young man, or hearing the news. The pleasant one. Or overcoming problems and fears. Or the job or career that he obtains or hopes to achieve, and God knows best.

As for the scholars’ interpretation of the vision Surah Al-Fatihah in a woman’s dream? Married / married. It is an indication of the collapse of problems and disputes between spouses. Or a door to the livelihood of a relative of hers or her husband, or news of an imminent pregnancy. If this one wishes, or that he will soon pay off his debt and reduce it, God willing, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Fatihah in A dream for a pregnant woman. A pregnant female vision. Reading Surah Al-Fatihah is a sign of her safety and health. And for her fetus, the removal of sorrows and problems, and a natural birth, God willing, and the abundance of food, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream for men. We will explain the vision of reading Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream for a man. It may foretell the nearness of sustenance or the imminent marriage of an unmarried young man, or hearing the news. The pleasant one. Or overcoming problems and fears. Or the job or career that he obtains or hopes to achieve, and God knows best.

title: Interpretation of a dream about Pharaohs in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the pharaohs in a dream The pharaohs are one of the symbols of human civilization, the owners of the wonders of the earth, which are likely to be a symbol of our mysterious dreams, so it is necessary to investigate the matter and discover the hidden meanings that this symbol carries for us in So we followed our dreams to know the secret behind seeing the pharaohs in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the pharaohs in a dream for a married woman Usually their dream is interpreted by a married woman with the many problems and fears in her life and the difficulties she faces. If you dream of wearing their clothes, this indicates wealth and prosperity in life. If a married woman sees in her dream that the pharaohs have left, this means that her husband has achieved the highest positions at work and has been promoted and that he has great importance in his work. Interpretation of a dream about the pharaohs and talking to them about a married woman is evidence of the emergence of many problems and disputes with a life partner, but they will disappear quickly. Dreaming of shaking hands with a married pharaoh is evidence that he will receive great benefit from a relative of his. Interpretation of a dream about the pharaohs in a dream for singles If an unmarried woman sees the pharaohs in a dream, this means that a person is not suitable at all He will propose to her and she must be careful when choosing. For an unmarried woman who saw the tombs of the pharaohs in a dream, this was evidence that she would achieve what she was aspiring to and aspired to, and she would listen to what would please her and bring her a lot of good. Dreaming of statues of the pharaohs in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence of her imminent engagement to a wealthy and well-off person who will make her happy with her life. If an unmarried woman is engaged and has a dream about a mummy, this is evidence of many problems with the fiancés and may have reached the point of breaking off the engagement. If she sees that she is sleeping in a wooden coffin, this is evidence of her delayed marriage. Interpretation of a dream about the pharaohs in a dream about a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman dreams of a child from the pharaohs, this indicates that the newborn was distinguished among people and distinguished by his future. If a pregnant woman dreams of a gold ring from the pharaohs, this indicates that the newborn was a male. If the dream contained a necklace of Pharaoh's gold, this is evidence that the newborn is a female, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the pharaohs in a dream about a man The dream of having more than one statue of the pharaoh in a dream for a man indicates an increase Material resources, expanding livelihood, abundance of blessings, and good conditions. If a man dreams that he himself has become a pharaoh in a dream, this is evidence of his promotion at work or his transfer to a better job. If he dreams of what is called the curse of the pharaohs, this indicates that he has committed many religious mistakes and must repent for them. Seeing the giants of Pharaoh in a dream indicates the presence of a hater who wishes him evil and evil and must be protected. Interpretation of the dream of the pharaohs in a dream about a widow Seeing a coffin in a dream symbolizes the widow's fear of what people will say or her unwillingness to work and go out in life. Interpretation of the dream of the pharaohs in a dream about a divorced woman If she dreams that her ex-husband brought her an ancient statue with a lot of dirt, and she hesitated

A dream about the presence of more than one statue of Pharaoh. In a man’s dream, it indicates an increase in material resources, an expansion of the scope of livelihood, an abundance of blessings, and good circumstances. title: Interpretation of expelling cats from the house in a dream

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of cats that came out of the house in a dream. God Almighty said: “They said that they dream of pipes. And we do not interpret dreams with two worlds (44).” Thick dreams are dreams that have no clear explanation. . This is because it is not a true vision from Almighty God for you. Satan often interferes in our dreams that we see during sleep and occupies us with them. To spoil our lives, exhaust us by thinking about them, being afraid of them, and in some cases dreams dominate the lives of people who pay great attention to them and the events that occur in them, and only God knows the unseen. No one should indulge in dreams. He forgot to live, and in this article in the encyclopedia we will provide an interpretation of expelling cats from the house in a dream. Interpretation of expelling cats from the house in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing cats in a dream and trying to expel them from the house? The appearance of cats in general in a dream expresses the betrayal and treachery that a person receives from some Those close to him, and seeing them being expelled from the house shows people close to the dreamer. Seeing cats in a dream also indicates good offspring. Seeing cats being expelled from the house means getting rid of all the worries, problems, and difficulties present in the dreamer’s life. If one sees in a dream that he is taking out a hungry cat From his house. This vision is a warning to the man who sees that he will make a mistake. If in a dream the person takes a cat out of his house. This expresses the approach of happy events in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of seeing cats being expelled from the house in a dream for a single woman. Expelling cats in one dream symbolizes the expulsion of evil and worries in her life. It is one of the praiseworthy visions of one girl. Dream of expelling a cat from the houseIf someone sees in a dream that he is expelling hungry cats from his house. This indicates that bad events are approaching. If a pregnant woman sees in a dream that she is expelling cats from her house. This indicates that she will get rid of all the problems she faces during pregnancy and also symbolizes the approaching date of her birth. If the young man is seen chasing the cat or cats outside the house. This symbolizes goodness, and food that will come soon. Seeing a person expelling cats from his home expresses the ability of that person to face all his problems and difficulties and the ability to solve them. Dimensions of cats in a dream Seeing a person in a dream that he was able to expel the cat that is attacking him. It expresses that he has overcome all the problems and worries in his life and work and that he will achieve all the ambitions and dreams that he seeks. The person who saw that the cat that was keeping him away managed to hit him. This indicates the losses incurred by the dreamer from his enemy. Seeing a cat escaping from the house: If a person sees in a dream that cats are leaving his house. This expresses a calm solution to all his problems. The annoying cats that escape from the house represent the debts that fall on the dreamer, and this dream promises him to get rid of these debts soon. In this article today, on the comprehensive website of the Arabic Encyclopedia, we present to you all the interpretations related to seeing cats being chased. And being taken out of the house in a dream, in all cases where the vision of cats is haunted by the appearance of aphids

title: What is the interpretation of seeing money in a dream?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of money in a dream? A question asked by many who have had this dream before, and it is one of the most common and mysterious dreams at the same time, as the dreamers do not know what symbols and connotations indicate this vision, but some dreamers see that this vision is an indication of goodness and living because it is one of the most important. God's blessings and it is the primary means of purchasing all the necessities we need in our daily lives. There are many cases of this dream between finding money and losing it, and its interpretations differ depending on other cases, such as the case of a man and a woman, and dream interpreters such as Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi analyze this vision, the interpretations of which can be found in an encyclopedia. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing money in a dream Imam Ibn Sirin mentioned If the dreamer sees in a dream that he has found a bunch of banknotes, then this vision is unpleasant and a sign of many problems in his life. If the dreamer dreams of seeing a bunch of money at a distance from him, then this vision is interpreted as a sign of gaining money after a long time. In the event that money is distributed to those around the dreamer in a dream, this vision is good news for the end of worries and sorrows. This vision shows good offspring in the event that only one piece of paper is found. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of the dream of money. With regard to Imam Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation, in the event that we see a lot of Money in a dream, this vision also indicates gaining a lot of money through inheritance, but in the event that we only see a piece of paper, this vision indicates that a child will be born soon, and God knows best. In the case of losing money in a dream, this vision is one of the hated dreams. Which carries two interpretations, the first of which is an indication of disobedience to God, and the second shows the loss of a loved one in reality. And God knows best. If the dreamer sees that he is carrying banknotes and proudly shows them to those around him, then this vision is unpleasant and indicates committing sins and disobeying reality. In the case of throwing banknotes from the house, this vision is a sign of the arrival of relief and the disappearance of worries and sorrows. As for finding a group A large number of bills, as this vision is a sign of goodness and abundance, as this vision is an indication of earning a lot of money. Interpretation of seeing money in a dream for a single woman: Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream of a banknote is one of the undesirable visions that indicate goodness, blessing, and livelihood, and it also indicates obtaining Money is from inheritance, and God knows best. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is taking money from someone in a dream, then this vision may indicate the approaching date of her wedding, and God knows best. As for losing money in a dream, this vision indicates not taking advantage of the opportunities that come. In reality. In the event that they see coins, this vision indicates that they will face many problems and difficulties in reality. Interpretation of a dream about money for a married woman. Seeing coins in a dream for a married woman indicates that she will become pregnant soon, and God knows best. In the case of acquiring banknotes

title: Interpretation of a dream about serving coffee and pouring coffee into cups in a dream

preview.html: Seeing coffee in a dream for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man who drinks coffee, makes coffee, pours coffee into a cup, pours coffee on someone according to Ibn Sirin and Imam Al. - Sadiq and others Pouring coffee in a dream is one of the dreams that we constantly see in our dreams and it has a number of different meanings for us, as coffee is one of the most widespread drinks in the world and has many lovers, due to its difference and vitality. Distinctive Taste As for seeing it in a dream, it has many symbols and connotations that we will learn about through our topic today on the interpretation of seeing coffee in a dream, from the commentator Ibn Sirin in his interpretations. Interpretation of pouring coffee in a dream When you pour coffee into cups, if the dream is about a girl who is not... If she is married, this is bad for her and includes pain and illness. For her outside the home. As for pouring coffee for a married woman, if she pours coffee into cups or cups, this indicates the bonding of her home and family because the cups are next to each other and similar, and it is said that it is a family reunion after the request. Which almost separated them. As for serving coffee to guests in a married woman’s dream, it is good news that she will come to her home or that happiness will enter her heart. And if the one who spilled the coffee is pregnant, then if she is in the first months of her pregnancy, then she is pregnant with a woman, but if she is in The last months of her pregnancy, this indicates the ease of her pregnancy. Her birth and safety are for herself and her next child, and if she serves coffee to guests and people, she will be proud of her son, and if people are men then it is for her son. He has a great status among people, and if the guests are women, then his status is among his family. As for pouring coffee on a man, it indicates generosity, strength, and increased livelihood, and it is said that it shows new ways of life that will open before the dreamer, and some said that for the unmarried dreamer, he will be blessed with a good wife who He guards his home and his trust, and a married man is happy to live in his house, and it is said that by pouring coffee into many cups, he will win in the family or gain a position among the people, especially if this vision is in a gathering of men. Interpretation of coffee in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing coffee in a dream is one of the visions that shows kindness. And happiness in the dreamer’s dream. Seeing yourself pouring coffee into a cup in a dream indicates the good that will be the dreamer’s share. Also, seeing coffee falling from the cup indicates good luck and positive changes that will happen to the dreamer, and God knows best. Seeing coffee roasting and its distinctive smell in a dream also symbolizes To get rid of the difficulties that stand in the dreamer’s way, and it is good news for him to achieve everything he wants in his life, and God knows best. Seeing white coffee also symbolizes what the dreamer will enjoy in his life in terms of happiness and success, and it is good news for the Gulf. Seeing an empty coffee cup in a dream shows the dreamer’s patience for what he really wants. Interpretation of pouring coffee in a dream for a single woman. Seeing coffee in a girl’s dream indicates On the great good that will be for her, which is the good news of marriage. I swear to God Almighty

title: Interpretation of a dream about white pieces of the uterus expelled by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about white pieces emerging from the womb: Dreams that carry different meanings, which depend largely on the social status and psychological state of the dreamer in real life, and in general, scientists interpret the dream with positive and negative interpretations depending on the path of the dream. Interpretation of dreams about white pieces emerging from the wombInterpretation of dreams For white parts of the uterus to appear in a girl’s dream is an indication of her marriage in the near future to a young man who suits her and who has a source of support and assistance in all the steps she wants so that she can do so. Achieving her goals. The white pieces that come out of the vaginal area are an indication of many benefits and benefits that the dreamer will achieve in the coming period and help her get rid of the problems and obstacles that she faces in her life, in addition to her entering a new period. As he will experience a series of good changes. The secretions that come out of the uterus in the form of white pieces for a married woman indicate the resolution of disputes and problems that occurred in her marital life in the past and the return of their good relationship again. Interpretation of a dream about white pieces of the uterus coming out by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets a dream about pieces coming out The white color of the womb is a sign of the end of disputes in real life and the beginning of a new era in which the dreamer will enjoy the psychological comfort and peace that she has missed for a long time. Seeing white pieces coming out of the womb in an unmarried girl’s dream is a sign of danger coming to her, regardless of success in her academic and professional life and reaching a prominent position that makes her a source of pride and happiness. Her family. In some cases, a dream about white lumps emerging profusely from the uterus indicates envy and hatred from some close people in real life. Interpretation of dreams about white lumps coming out of the uterus for single women. Interpretation of a dream about white masses coming out of the uterus of an unmarried girl is evidence of the final disappearance of problems Difficulties and the end of sadness and unhappiness, in addition to beginning to think positively and working for success and progress. If the unmarried girl is already suffering from some diseases and sees white secretions from the uterus in a dream, this indicates a short recovery and the return of her normal life again. White pieces indicate That comes out of the girl’s womb indicates the good things and benefits that will accrue to her in the near future, regardless of the large amount she receives and helps her significantly improve her financial and social life. A white thing comes out of the vagina in a dream for a single woman. A white thing comes out of the vagina in a dream for an unmarried woman. Married refers to her stable life in which she enjoys many advantages and benefits that help her a lot to move forward, apart from marrying the person she wants. The white things that come out of the vagina of an unmarried woman in a dream indicate a good time that the dreamer will soon experience, in addition to Success in academic and professional life and achieving a prominent position that raises its status among the people

Married refers to her stable life in which she enjoys many advantages and benefits that help her a lot to move forward, apart from marrying the person she wants. The white things that come out of the vagina of an unmarried woman in a dream indicate a good time that the dreamer will soon experience, in addition to Success in academic and professional life and achieving a prominent position that raises its status among the people
